title: Rolling an number greater than 2
text: There are 4 different ways to roll a number greater than 2. Either you roll a 3, 4, 5, or 6.

title: Total possible outcomes
text: There are a total of 6 possible outcomes when rolling a 6-sided cube. Either you roll a 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6.

title: Divide
text: Divide the number of outcomes for rolling a number larger than 2 by the total number of outcomes for your answer
